data.title: Robbie Williams Database
data.meta_description: Ayda Field is the wife of Robbie Williams. Learn more at RWDB.info!
data.text:
About

Ayda Sabahat Field-Williams, a talented actress and presenter, is renowned for her versatility and charisma in the world of entertainment. Beyond her professional achievements, Ayda holds a special place as the beloved wife of iconic singer and songwriter Robbie Williams. Her story is one of talent, love, and the intricate balance of a high-profile career and family life.

Born on May 17, 1979, in Los Angeles, California, to Haldun Evecan and Gwen Field, Ayda Field began her journey in the entertainment industry with a passion for acting. She honed her craft and gained recognition for her roles in various television shows and films.

Ayda's career highlights include appearances in popular series such as "Days of Our Lives" and "Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip." Her acting talent shone through in these roles, earning her accolades and a dedicated fan base. In addition to her acting prowess, Ayda has showcased her versatility as a television presenter, contributing her charm and wit to shows like "Loose Women."

However, Ayda Field's life took a remarkable turn when she crossed paths with the British pop sensation Robbie Williams. The couple's love story unfolded in a way that was both unconventional and endearing. Their relationship blossomed into a deep and enduring connection, culminating in their marriage in 2010.

Ayda's partnership with Robbie has been a central part of her life, marked by shared experiences, love, and the joys of parenthood. Together, they have navigated the challenges of fame while cherishing the importance of family. The couple welcomed four beautiful children into their lives: Teddy, Charlie, Coco, and Beau, each adding their unique sparkle to the Williams family.

In 2018, Ayda made a memorable appearance as a judge on the British television talent show "The X Factor." Her presence on the show showcased her candid and empathetic approach to mentoring young talent, winning the hearts of viewers and contestants alike.

Beyond her professional achievements, Ayda Field is celebrated for her role as a devoted wife and mother. Her love and support for Robbie Williams, along with her boundless dedication to their family, have solidified her place as a cherished member of the Williams clan.

Ayda Field's journey is a testament to the power of love and the harmonious blending of two vibrant lives in the world of entertainment.
